overview: Blessed with youthful looks and a bratty appeal perfect for roles as a Lolita temptress, Dorothy became famous for her roles as hot jailbait in Vista Valley PTA and the Taboo films. But by the time Taboo came out in 1980, Dorothy had actually been strutting her young stuff in the porn biz for 3 years! This collection includes many famous scenes as well as seldom seen rarities for those who can't get enough of this icon of dangerous seduction. Includes bonus interview.
title: Dorothy Lemay Taboo Teaser
